description: This Java source file defines a REST controller named HelloController, which provides several basic endpoints including a welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info. It uses Spring Boot annotations for REST API mapping and Swagger annotations for documentation.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring REST controller providing basic endpoints for welcome message, documentation redirect, health status, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/' and returns a welcome message.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/docs' and redirects to the Swagger UI.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/health' and returns application health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/api/info' and returns application information.
